page.title: 15LANGUAGE: A NEASDEN SURVEY
page.content:
{Northview School,}a primary school in Neasden did a survey of the languages spoken by children at the school.166 children were included in the survey and these are the results :-
{ENGLISH }166 {GREEK }2 {GUJERATI }45 {HINDI }2 {URDU }16 {PORTUGUESE }2 {PUNJABI }10 {TURKISH }2 {CARRIBEAN/ FARSI }1 {CREOLES }6 {FRENCH }1 {ARABIC }4 {SINDI }1 {TAMIL }4 {SWEDISH }1 {YARUBA }3 {TWI }1
{17 languages}are spoken by the children of Northview school. Many children speak two languages and there are some who can speak more than that. We think it is great to have friends from so many different backgrounds.
